title: Russia
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,449 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1040L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and T
description: Russia is the largest country in the world, which means there is much to learn about this fascinating place. Explore Russia's tumultuous history, amazing landscapes, and interesting people with this book.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
